property.value: Honor Dial

property.name: Type
property.value: Imperial Favor

property.name: Type
property.value: Imperial Favor

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a [Political] conflict, bow this stronghold, choose a participating character with [Political] skill 2 or lower - bow that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, bow this stonghold. Choose a participating character with 1 or more attachments on it - until the end of the conflict, that character gets +1[Military] and +1[Political] (+2[Military] and +2[Political] instead if it has 2 or more attachments on it).

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, bow this stronghold - each attacking character you control gets +1[Military] until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a conflict at this province - resolve the ring effect of that conflict as if you were the attacking player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this province is broken - dishonor each attacking character and honor each defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this province is revealed - your opponent chooses and discards cards from his or her hand until that player has 4 or fewer cards in hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this province is broken - draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict at this province, select one - switch the contested ring with an unclaimed ring (the conflict retains its type), or switch the conflict type (the conflict retains its ring).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an attack is declared here, break this province, your opponent chooses an attacking character - discard that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this province is revealed - switch the contested ring with an unclaimed ring. (The conflict retains its type.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this province is revealed - your opponent chooses and discards X cards from his or her hand. X is equal to the number of attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: During conflicts at this province, cancel all ring effects. (If this province breaks, resolve ring effects as normal.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, if there is a holding in play - look at the top 2 cards of your conflict deck. Add 1 of those cards to your hand and place the other on the bottom of your conflict deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is defending, opponents' card effects cannot bow it or move it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a card in one of your provinces - switch this holding with that card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Air.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, bow this character. Choose another [Crane] character - that character gets +3[Political] until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is your only participating character in a conflict - honor this character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, give your opponent 1 fate. That opponent must choose a ready participating character he or she controls - bow that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character is honored, choose a character - honor that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a facedown card in one of your provinces - turn that card faceup.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Duelist.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is attacking, choose a character controlled by your opponent - move that character to this conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a [Political] conflict, if you count more current [Political] skill in the conflict than your opponent - take 1 honor from that opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Duelist. Kenshinzen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, your opponent must choose a participating character he or she controls - challenge that character to a [Military] duel. If this character wins, move each character not involved in the duel home. If it loses, send it home.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Shugenja. Air.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sincerity. (When this character leaves play, draw 1 card.) Each honored [Crane] character you control gains sincerity.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is participating in a conflict, opponents cannot play events.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Champion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you claim a ring during a [Political] conflict in which this character is participating - resolve that ring's effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During the conflict phase - reveal the top card of your conflict deck. Until the end of the phase, you may play that card as if it were in your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited. (No more than one limited card can be played by each player each round.) You cannot place fate on this character when it is played from one of your provinces.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk. Tattooed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is attacking, spend 1 fate to an unclaimed ring - honor this character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for an attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Duelist.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is attacking alone, your opponent cannot declare more than 1 defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, bow a (friendly) attachment on it. Choose a participating character without attachments - bow that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk. Tattooed.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character gets +1[Military] and +1[Political] for each fate on each unclaimed ring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent selects a ring with fate on it - place 1 fate on this character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a [Political] conflict, spend 1 fate to an unclaimed ring - look at your opponent's hand. Choose 1 of those cards and discard it. (Max 1 per conflict.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Duelist.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, choose a participating character controlled by your opponent - challenge that character to a [Military] duel. If the loser of the duel has no fate on it, discard it. Otherwise remove 1 fate from it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk. Tattooed.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except Monk or Tattoo. Action: While this character is attacking, spend 1 fate to an unclaimed ring. Choose a Monk character or a character with a Monk attachment - ready that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you attach a Weapon attachment to this character - ready this character. (Limit twice per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Shugenja. Champion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a triggered ability printed on another character - this character gains that ability until the end of the phase. (Max 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins, each opponent who controls more characters than you must choose a character he or she controls with 1 or more fate on it - remove 1 fate from each chosen character.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent is more honorable than you, discard this character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After 1 or more fate is placed on this character - gain 1 honor.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Berserker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the fate phase begins, if you have at least 5 more honor than an opponent - this character cannot be discarded or lose fate this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pride. (After this character wins a conflict, honor it. After this character loses a conflict, dishonor it.) Reaction: After this character enters play from a province - refill that province faceup.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character loses a conflict as an attacker, sacrifice this character. Choose a character controlled by your opponent - if that character has no fate on it, discard it. Otherwise, remove 1 fate from that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Scholar.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, if you are more honorable than your opponent - honor this character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Water.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, bow this character. Choose a character in one of your discard piles - put that character into play in the conflict. If that character is still in play at the end of the conflict, return it to the bottom of its deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Courtier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is attacking, choose a character with equal or lower [Military] skill than this character - bow that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this character enters play, if you control 3 or more other Bushi characters - place 2 fate on this character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Commander.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a conflict in which this character is participating, each other participating [Lion] character you control gets +1[Military]. Reaction: After this character enters play - honor it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a [Political] conflict - put a Bushi character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your dynasty discard pile or provinces.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Champion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you claim a ring during a [Military] conflict in which this character is participating - resolve that ring's effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose up to 2 facedown cards in your provinces - turn the chosen cards faceup.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot participate in conflicts as an attacker.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Earth. Scholar.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, if the [Earth] ring is in your claimed ring pool, choose an attacking character - bow that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a [Fire] conflict, bow this character. Choose a participating character with printed cost 2 or lower - discard that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After honor dials are revealed - increase the value of your bid by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a character would be honored or dishonored, choose another character controlled by the same player - that character receives the honor or dishonor instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Reduce the cost of the next event you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Cavalry.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot be declared as a defender.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Cavalry.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready this character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Cavalry. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict - move this character to the conflict.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Imperial.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot participate in conflicts as an attacker against a player that controls the Imperial Favor.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Imperial.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character cannot participate in conflicts as an attacker against a player that controls the Imperial Favor.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shugenja. Earth. Imperial.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During the conflict phase, choose an attachment on an opponent's character - move that attachment to another character controlled by that opponent, if able.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bushi. Ronin.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, remove 1 fate from this character - it gets +2[Military] and +2[Political] until the end of the conflict. (Limit twice per conflict.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, sacrifice a (friendly) character - this character gets +3[Military] until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When attached character would leave play - discard this attachment instead.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Scholar.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is participating in a conflict, characters cannot become dishonored.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot be chosen as a target of an opponent's event.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains: "Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, choose a participating character controlled by your opponent - challenge that character to a [Military] duel. Instead of giving honor for this duel's bid, a player may choose and discard the required number of cards from hand. Bow the loser of the duel."

property.name: Text
property.value: This attachment cannot be played during a conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top 4 cards of each player's conflict deck. Choose 1 revealed card owned by each player and add it to its owner's hand. Shuffle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate, if you control more honored characters than an opponent - cancel those effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a [Crane] character you control - honor that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character that is defending alone - bow that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a (friendly) honored character. Choose a dishonored character - discard that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk. Tattooed.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this character as an attachment with the text: "Attached character gains covert."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Monk. Tattooed.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this character as an attachment with the text: "Action: During a conflict in which attached character is participating, choose another participating character - move 1 fate from that character to the attached character."

property.name: Text
property.value: Ancestral. (When attached card leaves play, return this card to your hand.) Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Ancestral. (When attached card leaves play, return this card to your hand.) Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Limit 1 per character. You may trigger each of attached character's triggered abilities an additional time each round (or specified period).

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an attachment - discard it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Kiho. Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent declares a [Fire] conflict, choose a Monk character or a character with a Monk attachment - place 1 fate on that character and draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a conflict in which you control only a single participating character - that character does not bow as a result of the conflict's resolution.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, choose an attacking character with glory X or lower - bow that character. X is equal to the number of unrevealed provinces you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a [Military] conflict - put this character into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While this character is attacking, your opponent must choose a participating character he or she controls - move that character home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Play this attachment from your conflict discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.) Reaction: After attached character wins a conflict - gain 1 honor.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Banner.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Bushi character you control. Attached character does not bow as a result of conflict resolution during [Military] conflicts.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent's card effect or a ring effect bows a character you control - ready that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When an honored character you control would leave play - instead discard that character's status token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, choose a [Lion] character - double that character's base [Military] skill until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you break a province during a [Military] conflict - place 1 fate on each participating Bushi character you control. (Max 1 per conflict.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While you are the attacking player, choose a defending character with glory X or lower - move that character home. X is equal to the number of attacking characters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Courtier. Shugenja. Air.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this character is attacking, the contested ring gains the [Air] element. If this character wins the conflict as an attacker, you may choose which of its ring effects to resolve.

property.name: Text
property.value: This attachment cannot be played during a conflict. Attached character cannot participate in [Military] conflicts.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spell. Void.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Switch a ring in your claimed ring pool with an unclaimed ring and gain all fate on that ring. (Retain the ring's conflict type.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, if the bid on your honor dial is higher than an opponent's, choose a participating dishonored character controlled by that opponent - discard that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you are less honorable than your opponent. Action: During a conflict, choose a character controlled by your opponent with printed cost 2 or lower - take control of that character until the end of the conflict.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the resolution of your first conflict this phase as the attacking player, if that conflict broke a province - immediately declare your second conflict for this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you would pass the first player token - keep it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Restricted. (No more than two restricted attachments per character.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spell. Air.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a Shugenja character. Treat attached character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character - that character gets +2[Military] until the end of the conflict. You may lose 1 honor to resolve this ability twice. (Max 1 per conflict.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a conflict, if you control a participating Courtier character, choose a participating character controlled by your opponent. Your opponent must select one - dishonor the chosen character or bow it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's. Action: Choose a character with printed cost 3 or higher - place 1 fate on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [Political] conflict, dishonor a (friendly) participating character - discard 2 cards at random from your opponent's hand. (Max 1 per conflict.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a [Military] conflict by 5 or more skill, choose a participating character - discard that character. (Max 1 per conflict.)
